snippet: The San Francisco Giants landed a top-tier starter to complement ace Madison Bumgarner, agreeing with the free agent Jeff Samardzija on a $90 million, five-year contract Saturday, a day after losing out on Zack Greinke.
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Giants landed a top-tier starter to complement ace Madison Bumgarner, agreeing with the free agent Jeff Samardzija on a $90 million, five-year contract Saturday, a day after losing out on Zack Greinke.
